Pre-Game Insights: The Rockets finished the 2023-24 season with a 41-41 overall record and a strong 27-14 home record. The Hornets had a 21-61 overall record and struggled on the road last season with a 10-31 record. The Rockets averaged 24.8 assists per game and shot 41.8% from the field last season, while the Hornets shot 46.0% from the field and 35.5% from three-point range last season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rockets have no listed injuries, while the Hornets have Cody Martin (day-to-day with a wrist injury) and Mark Williams (out with a foot injury).
